name: newuser
description: Brings up the menu of new user commands.

options.name: view
options.description: Shows the values of the current new user settings.

options.name: enabled
options.description: Whether Dude should send a message when a new user joins the server.

options.name: mention
options.description: Whether Dude should @ the user as part of the message.

options.name: message
options.description: The message Dude should send when a new user joins the server.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel Dude should send new user join messages in.
